review: Doctor is very professional. Explained the treatment well. *** * ******* ********** Clinic ambience and especially the instrumental music keeps your mind calm. Didnt let me feel much pain during the procedure. My past treated records are kept well in check and really helpful for taking care of future treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Amazing experience.
Highly skilled doctor.
Hygienic clinic.
Homely paraphernalia.
Least time without wait.
Cosy ambience.
Concern about dental issues with satisfaction.
Friendly interaction.
Formal professionalism and informal aura.
10/10.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sanju is a brave woman, she works hard and is talented.  She is a right hand to Dr. Adosh. I know her over 6 years, when she fixed my teeth problems. Wishing her the Best.

tags: None
review: Previous dentist from ECHS put bridge on decayed tooth which gave pain and problem within 2 months. . Dr Adosh Lall found it and removed the bad tooth. DrSanju created a denture with which I am very comfortable now. I strongly recommend Dr Sanju to my one who has dental problem. My daughter will be seeing her soon for her tooth problem.
